assignment6monsters

Class OrcWarlord

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment6monsters.Monster
      • assignment6monsters.OrcInfantry
        • assignment6monsters.OrcWarlord

  • public class OrcWarlord
extends OrcInfantry
    This is the Orc Warlord class object for Assignment6 Monsters program. Extends the Orc Infantry class, and additionally holds an array of 5 OrcInfantry objects, which this object will be considered the leader of. On top of that, the Orc Warlord class has a leadership value between 1-5 and a leadership bonus derived from how much treasure it has. I, Sean Flannigan, student number 000270501, certify that all code submitted is my own work; that I have not copied it from any other source. I also certify that I have not allowed my work to be copied by others.

      constructor to allow specific values to be passed in on creation rather than have them randomly chosen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OrcWarlord

        public OrcWarlord(java.lang.String clan)
        basic constructor with random values assigned to most of the object's attributes
        Parameters:
        clan - String passed from FoonLogic class to set a clan

      • OrcWarlord

        public OrcWarlord(java.lang.String clan,
                  int ferocity,
                  int defense,
                  int magic,
                  int health,
                  int treature,
                  int leadership)
        constructor to allow specific values to be passed in on creation rather than have them randomly chosen.
        Parameters:
        clan - String passed from FoonLogic class to set a clan
        ferocity - int value for the ferocity attribute
        defense - int value for the defense attribute
        magic - int value for the magic attribute
        health - int value for the health of the object
        treature - int value for how much treasure the object has
        leadership - int value for the leadership attribute

    • Method Detail

      • raiseLeadership

        public void raiseLeadership()
        method to raise leadership by 1, so long as this object is alive and has less than 5 leadership at present.

      • lowerLeadership

        public void lowerLeadership()
        method to lower leadership by 1, so long as this object is alive and has more than 1 leadership at present.

      • leaderBonusUpdate

        public void leaderBonusUpdate()
        method that checks how much treasure this object has and applies it to a leadership bonus here. 10 treasure for +1 leadership bonus.

      • battleCry

        public void battleCry()
        battle cry method that can be used so long as this object is alive. heals all the Orc Infantry that this object is the leader of for a value derived from this object's leadership and leadership bonus attributes.

      • setSquad

        public void setSquad(OrcInfantry[] squad)
        setter to take in a squad of 5 Orc Infantry objects for this object to be the leader of
        Parameters:
        squad - array of 5 Orc Infantry objects

      • getSquad

        public OrcInfantry[] getSquad()
        getter for the OrcInfantry array squad, to return the objects that this object is in charge of
        Returns:
        squad variable array of 5 Orc Infantry objects.

      • getAttackScore

        public double getAttackScore()
        Overriden getAttackScore method, used when an Orc Warlord object is attacking rather than the getAttackScore method within the Monster class. allows the Orc Warlord to attack with 1.5x the average of their attributes. Math.floor used to truncate to 2 digits
        Overrides:
        getAttackScore in class Monster
        Returns:
        double attack score value or 0 if dead.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overriden toString that passes the call back to this class's super to output all of this object's attributes.
        Overrides:
        toString in class OrcInfantry
        Returns:
        String message of all of this object's attributes.
